pkgmetadata.longdescription: Transmissions and Receptions in a Hop by Hop Network // Computes the expectation of the number of transmissions and receptions considering a Hop-by-Hop transport model with limited number of retransmissions per packet. It provides the theoretical results shown in Palma et. al.(2015) DOI:10.1109/APCASE.2015.59 and also estimated values based on Monte Carlo simulations.
